cac:PartyName.cbc:Name: Waterford and Wexford Education and Training Board_110494
Bord Oideachais agus Oiliúna Phort Láirge agus Loch Garman_110494

cac:PostalAddress.cbc:StreetName: Head Office, Ardcavan Business Park, Ardcavan Wexford

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: 2024– 2028 Framework for Integrated Design Consultancy Services for (a) Energy Retrofitting Programme and (b) Other Capital Works Projects in ETB Schools, FET Centres and DoE Schools

2024 – 2028 Creat le haghaidh Seirbhísí Comhtháite Comhairleoireachta Dearaidh le haghaidh (a) Clár Iarfheistithe Fuinnimh agus (b) Tionscadail Oibreacha Caipitiúla Eile sa ETB Scoileanna, Ionaid FET agus Scoileanna DoE
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description:
Waterford and Wexford Education & Training Board (WWETB) on behalf of the 16 education and training boards (Framework Clients) and the Department of Education (DoE) seek applicants for an Integrated Design Team (IDT) Framework to support the delivery of energy retrofitting and other non energy related Capital Works projects funded by both Departments. One objective of this framework is to implement a range of energy efficiency and decarbonisation measures in DoE and ETB buildings within the next four years. These services are required to assist in the delivery of refurbishment works and other works to support the Climate Action agenda. Support services required: - Architects - Civil and Structural Engineers - Services Engineers (Mechanical and Electrical) - Quantity Surveyors - Project Supervisors Design Process (PSDP) It is anticipated that a formal RFT seeking applications in connection with these Frameworks will issue in Q1 2025.
Project Values: Type1(<€1m), Type 2a (€1m - €3m) & Type 2b (€3m - €10m) The Notional Budget for this
Programme of Works is €60m to €180m (incl. Vat & Fees).
The Total Multi-supplier Framework Value is between €9m to €27m (excl. VAT)
Description of the procurement: In regard of this service, the appointed Integrated Design Teams will support ETBs and DoE in the provision of full design service in all aspects of design, planning, project cost management, procurement, environmental, construction management, administration and final certification- Stages 1 Preliminary Design to Stage 5 Handover of Works.
A Project seminar will be organized for w/c 23.09.2024 to outline a summary of Project scope and procurement strategy.
Interested parties are required to submit an expression of interest to attend the seminar by email to etenderresponses@wwetb.ie for inclusion in our official list of attendees.
At application stage applicants will be required to submit a completed DoE-QC1 Suitability Assessment Declaration together with evidence of previous projects indicating relevant experience. Based on the information provided and criteria, applicant submissions will be evaluated, and successful applicants will be included on the framework panels. It is envisaged to have three panels: - Type 1: including 20 framework IDTs - Type 2a: including 15 framework IDTs - Type 2b: including 10 framework IDTs

Bord Oideachais & Oiliúna Phort Láirge agus Loch Garman (WWETB) ar son na 16 oideachais agus lorgaíonn boird oiliúna (Cliaint Réime) agus an Roinn Oideachais (DoE) iarratasóirí ar Foireann Deartha Comhtháite (IDT) Creat chun tacú le hiarfheistiú fuinnimh agus tionscadail Oibreacha Caipitil eile nach mbaineann le fuinneamh atá maoinithe ag an dá Roinn. Cuspóir amháin den chreat seo chun raon beart éifeachtúlachta fuinnimh agus dícharbónaithe a chur i bhfeidhm i bhfoirgnimh DoE agus BOO laistigh de na ceithre bliana atá romhainn. Tá na seirbhísí seo ag teastáil chun cabhrú le seachadadh oibreacha athchóirithe agus oibreacha eile ar tacú leis an gclár oibre um Ghníomhú ar son na hAeráide. Seirbhísí tacaíochta ag teastáil: - Ailtirí - Innealtóirí Sibhialta agus Struchtúrtha - Innealtóirí Seirbhísí (Meicniúla agus Leictreach) - Suirbhéirí Cainníochta - Próiseas Dearaidh Maoirseoirí Tionscadail (PSDP) Táthar ag súil go n-eiseofar RFT foirmiúil ag lorg iarratais i ndáil leis na Creataí seo i Q1 2025.
Luachanna Tionscadail: Cineál 1(<€1m), Cineál 2a (€1m - €3m) & Cineál 2b (€3m - €10m)
Is é an Buiséad Barúlach don Chlár Oibre seo ná €60m go €180m (VAT & Táillí san áireamh).
Is é an Creat-Luach Iomlán Ilsoláthraí ná idir €9m agus €27m (gan VAT)
Cur síos ar an soláthar: Maidir leis an tseirbhís seo, tacóidh na Foirne Deartha Comhtháite ceaptha le Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna agus an Roinn Comhshaoil ​​sna seirbhís dheartha iomlán a sholáthar i ngach gné de dhearadh, pleanáil, bainistíocht costas tionscadail, soláthar, timpeallacht, bainistíocht tógála, riarachán agus deimhniú deiridh - Céimeanna 1 Réamhdhearadh go Céim 5 Aistriú na Saothar.
Eagrófar seimineár Tionscadail do w/c 23.09.2024 chun achoimre ar scóip an Tionscadail agus straitéis soláthair.
Ní mór do pháirtithe leasmhara léiriú spéise a chur isteach chun freastal ar an seimineár ar ríomhphost chuig etenderresponses@wwetb.ie le cur san áireamh inár liosta oifigiúil den lucht freastail.
Ag céim an iarratais beidh ar iarratasóirí Oiriúnacht DoE-QC1 comhlánaithe a chur isteach Dearbhú Measúnaithe mar aon le fianaise ar thionscadail roimhe seo a léiríonn taithí ábhartha. Bunaithe ar an eolas a cuireadh ar fáil agus ar na critéir, déanfar aighneachtaí iarratasóirí a mheas, agus cuirfear na hiarratasóirí rathúla san áireamh ar na creatphainéil. Tá sé i gceist trí phainéal a bheith ann: - Cineál 1: lena n-áirítear 20 creat IDT - Cineál 2a: lena n-áirítear 15 chreat IDT - Cineál 2b: lena n-áirítear 10 gcreat IDT
